short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easy timer window access. Notifies often if there's tasks with active timer. Timer is paused if no action is taken.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Clocking It is really usefull, but some users forget that there's a timer running for a task. This extension tries to solve that by alerting the user every so often, if there's tasks with a active timer on clickingit.com. If the user doesn't click the notification, the timer is automatically paused.

Option to notify if there's no tasks with active timers.

Easy access to "Timer Window" by clicking on the extension icon.

DISCLAIMER: I don't owe the rights of Clocking Its site, logo or name. This plugin is for personal use only.
